resources.string: Enter your details and quickly calculate your tax code.
Get the barcode of your tax code and use it easily instead of your health card.
Save the tax codes you have calculated, and always keep them handy.
Set up your personal profile, and access your personal tax code with a single touch.
Choose the theme you prefer. Try night mode to save battery and reduce eye strain.
To apply the theme you need to restart the application, do you want to do it now?
Are you sure you want to delete the saved data?
Are you sure you want to exit the application?
